title: Is it just me or is AP super weak?
body:
How is it that today I was a fed Twisted Fate vs a fed Zed both full build yet I still cant over half health him with a full perfect combo? He had 176 MR as Well as 400+ ad. He could easily one shot me with little and always got out alive due to the the maw passive.  Why is it that its acceptable for this to happen? 

In what game do you build tanky and still be one of the main damage dealers?

replies.body: "176 MR" is probably the issue. That and the fact you seem to build 0 mpen. Everything is weak if you build it badly.

You cant Pen 176 in a burst duel - that's why AP feels weak.
You either have the pen and lack the DMG or have the DMG and lack the pen.

One the origins of this problem is the fact that ADdmg was never balanced around having that much pen avaiable while AP DMG is always balanced around having Sorc+Void + 8RunePen nothing more and nothing less.

Zed doesn't have a targeted stun and his map presence, and ganks, are also nowhere near as good as TF's. Why should TF also be a decent duelist on top of what he has? Unlike Zed, TF doesn't have to be fed to win games. Just liike most mages, he can make plays even when behind.

WE'RE NOT TALKING ABOUT THE FUCKING KIT. WE MEAN AP IN GENERAL PPPPLLLLL SOOOO DUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUMB

dont give me that bullshit dude. anyone who fed is hard to deal with. yes mages may just have more cc than some ad champs. that's not the problem. 

with the recent buffs to ad lethality we talking about
{{item:3147}} {{item:3814}} {{item:3142}}
on top of
 {{item:3036}} 
and on top of mages obviously being more mana hungry due to being caster compared to their auto attacking counter parts
mages have to build mana most of the time instead of getting damage. by this time (if ur opponent has a brain cell and) he'll be building some sort of mr, however small the amount may be. this causes you to rush {{item:3020}} over maybe taking cdr or what have you, while ur ad champs are probably on their way to their first lethality item with a {{item:3134}} in their pockets. 

mages are having to jump over hoops just to be relevant in early to mid game. with the exception of {{champion:13}} most mages have to wait (if they make it that long) to late to start dealing the type of dmg ad champs are from early to late game. and even then with {{item:3814}} our cc you base ur arguement around is almost irrelevant. and if you're a full tank. dont worry about mages at all honestly. the only big amount of magic pen we have is {{item:3135}} and maybe coupled with {{item:3001}} it might help a little bit. 

but its not we can just buy them. we also have core items we have to build where most ad champs a rushing {{item:3134}} and dont worry about their "core" items. 

i think we need a {{item:3134}} but for ap champs

if ur gonna have a penetration meta. then have a penetration meta...for everyone...
so we have to either choose between our sustain or dmg. and mages cant afford to just go dmg :/
AP itself isn't that weak. It could use a few more magic pen items but that's pretty much it.
